tests.title: Checking the Index Page /index
tests.fullTitle: HTML Page Checking the Index Page /index
tests.code:
request(server)
.get('/index')
.end(function(error, res){
expect(res).to.have.property('status', 200);
done();
});

passes.title: Checking the Index Page /index
passes.fullTitle: HTML Page Checking the Index Page /index
passes.code:
request(server)
.get('/index')
.end(function(error, res){
expect(res).to.have.property('status', 200);
done();
});

tests.title: Creating the todolist using /api/todo POST
tests.fullTitle: Routes Testing Creating the todolist using /api/todo POST
tests.code:
request(server)
.post('/api/todo')
.send({work: "Gulp", description: "Gulp Basics", user: "Aditya", date: "2016-10-23"})
.end(function(error, res){
expect(res).to.have.property('status',200);
console.log(res.body);
expect(res.body).to.equal("Data inserted");
done();
});

tests.title: Retrieving the todolist using /api/todo GET
tests.fullTitle: Routes Testing Retrieving the todolist using /api/todo GET
tests.code:
request(server)
.get('/api/todo')
.end(function(error, res){
expect(res).to.have.property('status',200);
expect(res).to.be.json;
expect(res.body).to.be.a('Array');
expect(res.body[0]).to.be.a('object');
expect(res.body[0]).to.have.property('task');
expect(res.body[0]).to.have.property('description');
expect(res.body[0]).to.have.property('_id');
expect(res.body[0]).to.have.property('user');
expect(res.body[0]).to.have.property('date');
expect(res.body[0].task).to.equal('Sample');
//console.log(res.body);
done();
});

tests.title: Retrieving the todo based on ID using /api/todo/:id GET
tests.fullTitle: Routes Testing Retrieving the todo based on ID using /api/todo/:id GET
tests.code:
request(server)
.get('/api/todo')
.end(function(error, res){
request(server)
.get('/api/todo/' + res.body[0]._id)
.end(function(error, res){
expect(res).to.have.property('status', 200);
console.log(res.body);
expect(res).to.be.json;
expect(res.body).to.be.json;
expect(res.body).to.be.a('object');
expect(res.body).to.have.property('task');
expect(res.body).to.have.property('description');
expect(res.body).to.have.property('_id');
expect(res.body).to.have.property('user');
expect(res.body).to.have.property('date');
expect(res.body.task).to.equal('Sample');
done();
});
});

tests.title: Updating the todo list based on ID using /api/todo/ PUT
tests.fullTitle: Routes Testing Updating the todo list based on ID using /api/todo/ PUT
tests.code:
request(server)
.get('/api/todo')
.end(function(error, res){
request(server)
.put('/api/todo/')
.send({_id: res.body[0]._id ,work: "Gulp Tutorial", description: "Gulp Basics"})
.end(function(error, res){
expect(res).to.have.property('status', 200);
console.log(res.body);
expect(res).to.be.json;
expect(res.body).to.equal("Data Successfully updated");
done();
});
});

tests.title: Delete one todo from todo based on ID using /api/todo/:id DELETE
tests.fullTitle: Routes Testing Delete one todo from todo based on ID using /api/todo/:id DELETE
tests.code:
request(server)
.get('/api/todo')
.end(function(error, res){
request(server)
.delete('/api/todo/' + res.body[0]._id)
.end(function(error, resp){
expect(resp).to.have.property('status', 200);
expect(resp).to.be.json;
expect(resp.body).to.equal("Task deleted successfully");
done();
});
});
